titleStmt.title: A short censure of the book of W.P. entituled, The University of Oxfords plea, refuted
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Bagshaw. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Place of publication and printer from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
